mapper.select: /*Mapper - "vcRsvList"*/ SELECT A.VR_NO VR_NO, (SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE B.TT_AUTHORITY=E.CODE) TT_AUTHORITY , B.TT_NAME TT_NAME,C.SS_NAME SS_NAME , (SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE A.VR_FIELD=E.CODE) VR_FIELD , (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.VR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) VR_DATE , D.TIME VR_TIME, A.VR_INSERTDATE VR_INSERTDATE ,(SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE A.VR_STATUS=E.CODE) VR_STATUS ,A.VR_CONTENTS ,NVL((SELECT F.VC_COMMENTS FROM VISIT_COMMENT F WHERE A.VR_NO=F.VR_NO AND F.VC_DELETEYN='Y'), '-' )VC_COMMENTS ,(SELECT E.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE E WHERE C.SS_GRADE=E.CODE) SS_GRADE , B.TT_AUTHORITY TT_AUTHORITY FROM VISITCOUNSEL_RSV A, T_MEMBER B,S_MEMBER C,CODE_VISITTIMETABLE D WHERE A.TT_NO=B.TT_NO AND A.SS_NO=C.SS_NO AND A.VR_TIME=D.TIMENO AND A.SS_NO=#{ssNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/*Mapper - "vcRsvList"*/ SELECT C.TIME VR_TIME, A.TT_NO TT_NO, A.ED_DATE VR_DATE , B.SS_NO SS_NO, B.VR_STATUS VR_STATUS FROM EDU_OPEN_TIME A LEFT JOIN VISITCOUNSEL_RSV B ON(A.TT_NO=B.TT_NO AND A.ED_DATE =B.VR_DATE AND A.ED_TIMENO=B.VR_TIME AND B.VR_DELETEYN='Y') INNER JOIN CODE_VISITTIMETABLE C ON(A.ED_TIMENO=C.TIMENO) WHERE A.TT_NO = #{ttNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY VR_DATE, VR_TIME
mapper.insert: /*Mapper - insertVC */ INSERT INTO VISITCOUNSEL_RSV (VR_NO, SS_NO,TT_NO,VR_STATUS, VR_TIME,VR_DATE,VR_FIELD,VR_CONTENTS,VR_INSERTDATE,VR_DELETEYN) VALUES (#{vrNo},#{ssNo},#{ttNo},'01' ,(SELECT TIMENO FROM CODE_VISITTIMETABLE WHERE TIME=#{vrTime}) ,#{vrDate},#{vrField},#{vrContents},SYSDATE,'Y')
mapper.select: /* Mapper - userGrade */ SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME AS SS_NO FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE UPPER(TABLE_NAME) LIKE '%'||(SELECT SS_GRADE FROM S_MEMBER WHERE SS_NO=#{ssNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%'
mapper.update: /*Mapper - cancelBooking*/ UPDATE VISITCOUNSEL_RSV SET VR_DELETEYN = 'N' ,VR_STATUS='03' WHERE VR_NO =#{vrNo} AND VR_DELETEYN = 'Y'
